ingredients.content: 50 g fresh horseradish, cut in pieces
1 lemon, thin peelings of skin and juice
1 tin cooked chickpeas, 1 x 400 g tin (drained weight approx. 240 g)

preparations.content: Place horseradish in mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic and thin peelings of skin from ½ lemon in mixing bowl then grate <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add drained chickpeas, 40 g lemon juice and 25 g olive oil then blend <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add reserved grated horseradish, crème fraîche, salt and pepper then blend again <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>.
Add remaining 25 g oil and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Serve as a dip with crudités or crackers.
